title: Astroflap
description: Astroflap is a classic arcade game in which the player takes on the role of an astronaut exploring caves on an unknown planet.
detailedDescription: Astroflap is a classic arcade game in which the player takes on the role of an astronaut exploring caves on an unknown planet using a jet pack. Designed to be fun as well as challenging. Explore caves, collect diamonds. Perform stunts and avoid obstacles.

title: Fox Runner
description: Fox Runner is a 3D platformer where the goal is to travel as far as possible, avoiding obstacles and collecting extra time by jumping over gates.
detailedDescription: Fox runner is a platform game with 3D graphics, where the player's goal is to travel as much distance as possible. During gameplay, the player has to avoid obstacles and collect extra time by jumping over gates. The game engine generates a new route with each playthrough, making the game a completely new experience each time!

title: Alien Defense
description: Alien Defence is a sci-fi arcade shooter where you battle waves of alien invaders to save humanity. Inspired by "Tower Defense" games, it offers exciting, story-driven missions.
detailedDescription: The gameplay in Alien Defence aims to maintain the classic physicality of shooting in an arcade game. A Science Fiction themed game in which you travel through the galaxy, fight ruthless enemies and uncover dark secrets to save all of humanity. With a fascinating story and exciting missions, this game will draw you in from the very beginning. The gameplay is easy to learn and provides entertainment for hours. It is inspired by "Tower Defense" type games, where your task is to defend your planet from waves of invaders from outer space.

title: VR Juggling Simulator
description: VR Juggling Simulator helps users learn juggling with realistic physics, adjustable difficulty, and visual/audio guidance. It features slow motion and instant ball resets for a more engaging and accessible training experience.
detailedDescription: VR Juggling Simulator is designed to teach juggling using realistic physics for accurate ball trajectories and collisions. It features adjustable difficulty levels, a progression system, and intelligent guidance with visual and audio cues to improve timing and positioning. The game includes a slow-motion mode for detailed analysis and an instant ball reset feature for continuous practice. Developed as part of a Master's thesis, the simulator was used in a study comparing VR and real-world training, showing that VR enhances engagement and builds foundational skills, even if initial real-world performance transfer is limited.

title: Once Upon a Conquest
description: A hack-and-slash platformer where you play as the Overlord, wreaking havoc on a peaceful kingdom. It features destructible environments, dynamic combat, and Unity's New Input System.
detailedDescription: A narrative-driven hack-and-slash platformer where players control the Overlord, destroying a peaceful kingdom with dynamic combat and destructible environments. The game utilizes Unity's New Input System for seamless gamepad and keyboard support, with advanced AI that includes enemy behaviors like patrolling, fear responses, and strategic attacks. Destructible environments are implemented with multiple levels of destruction, enhancing the immersive experience, while intuitive controls and responsive animations provide fluid combat flow and a polished user experience. The game's technical design focuses on creating an engaging and immersive world through robust mechanics and high-performance gameplay.

title: VR fire safety training simulation
description: The VR fire safety simulation lets users practice realistic fire-extinguishing actions in an immersive environment. Built with Unity and C#, it tracks performance and provides feedback to improve fire safety skills.
detailedDescription: The VR fire safety training simulation offers an interactive and immersive experience, where users can perform realistic actions like grabbing a fire extinguisher, removing the safety pin, and extinguishing fires in a simulated room environment. Built using Unity and C#, the simulation incorporates performance tracking to monitor metrics such as task completion time and extinguisher usage, providing valuable insights into user efficiency. Detailed post-training feedback reports help users assess and improve their fire safety skills, while the immersive design ensures high engagement and practical learning. The project leverages VR interaction design and performance tracking systems to create an effective and engaging training tool.

title: Bedtime Bash
description: I led a team of three programmers in an 18-member group, building a Unity game with advanced AI, state machines, NavMesh navigation, and precise weapon mechanics.
detailedDescription: This project highlights both my leadership and technical expertise, as I led a team of three programmers within an 18-member group. I managed task delegation, ensuring efficiency by assigning work based on team strengths and meeting deadlines. On the technical side, I developed advanced AI using a state machine pattern and integrated Unity's NavMesh for improved enemy navigation and behavior. Additionally, I refined weapon mechanics by aligning physical interactions with animations for a seamless player experience. Built in Unity with C#, the project demonstrates my skills in AI programming, gameplay mechanics, and team leadership.

title: TowAR Defense
description: An AR tower defense game for HoloLens where players defend against spiders using spatial mapping and hand-tracked tower placement. Built with Unity and Blender.
detailedDescription: This AR tower defense game for Microsoft HoloLens challenges players to defend their base against waves of attacking spiders using spatial mapping and interactive hand-tracked tower placement. Built in Unity, it leverages HoloLens' AR capabilities for real-world interaction, allowing players to position the game board on any surface. The project includes custom 3D models and animations created in Blender, enhancing the visual and gameplay experience. By integrating real-time spatial awareness, immersive mechanics, and interactive controls, the game pushes the boundaries of AR gaming and user engagement.

title: Smoke Fusion
description: An interactive amusement park game that uses RFID cards to track player progress and encourage physical activity. Built with Unity and URP, it features glowing visuals, Android kiosk support, and an online test version.
detailedDescription: This interactive game, designed for amusement parks, utilizes RFID technology to track players' progress and personalize their experience. Players use RFID cards to engage with interactive screens distributed throughout the park, encouraging physical activity and providing an engaging way to explore the area. Developed in Unity3D with the Universal Render Pipeline (URP), the game features custom shaders that create visually striking glowing effects, enhancing the immersive experience. Optimized for Android kiosks, the game runs seamlessly on large interactive screens, offering a user-friendly interface. Additionally, an online version is available for testing and simulating the experience, allowing players to preview the fun before visiting the amusement park.
